metadata.name: Ten Gods System Dataset
metadata.description: Complete data for the Ten Gods (十神) system used in BaZi analysis, including relationships, meanings, and applications
metadata.author: FatePath BaZi Master

fields.name: meaning
fields.example: Represents peers, siblings, friends, and competitors

fields.name: wealth
fields.example: Neutral - can help or compete for resources

fields.name: relationships
fields.example: Represents siblings, friends, and equal partners

example.unfavorable: When too many create competition and conflict

data.meaning: Represents peers, siblings, friends, and competitors
data.wealth: Neutral - can help or compete for resources
data.relationships: Represents siblings, friends, and equal partners

strength.unfavorable: When too many create competition and conflict

data.meaning: Represents competitors, rivals, and those who compete for resources
data.wealth: Can compete for or rob wealth and resources
data.relationships: Represents rivals, competitors, and challenging relationships

strength.favorable: When controlled, provides motivation and drive
strength.unfavorable: When excessive, creates conflict and loss

data.meaning: Represents creativity, expression, and what one produces
data.wealth: Favorable - represents income from creativity and expression
data.relationships: Represents children, students, and those one nurtures

strength.favorable: When moderate, brings creativity and expression
strength.unfavorable: When excessive, can lead to over-indulgence

data.relationship: Element that this element generates (opposite polarity)
data.meaning: Represents innovation, rebellion, and challenging authority
data.wealth: Variable - can bring wealth through innovation or cause loss through rebellion
data.relationships: Represents challenging relationships and authority conflicts

strength.favorable: When controlled, brings innovation and progress
strength.unfavorable: When excessive, creates conflict and rebellion

data.meaning: Represents wealth from business, investment, and indirect sources
data.wealth: Very favorable - represents wealth and financial opportunities
data.relationships: Represents business relationships and financial partnerships

strength.favorable: When present, brings wealth and financial success
strength.unfavorable: When excessive, can lead to greed and financial risk

data.relationship: Element that this element controls (opposite polarity)
data.meaning: Represents stable income, salary, and direct wealth sources
data.wealth: Very favorable - represents stable and reliable income
data.relationships: Represents stable relationships and traditional partnerships

strength.favorable: When present, brings stable wealth and financial security
strength.unfavorable: When excessive, can lead to materialism and conservatism

data.meaning: Represents authority, power, and challenging situations
data.wealth: Variable - can bring wealth through authority or cause loss through conflict
data.relationships: Represents authority figures and challenging relationships

strength.favorable: When controlled, brings authority and leadership
strength.unfavorable: When excessive, creates conflict and violence

data.relationship: Element that controls this element (opposite polarity)
data.meaning: Represents official authority, government, and formal recognition
data.wealth: Favorable - represents income from official positions and recognition
data.relationships: Represents official relationships and formal partnerships

strength.favorable: When present, brings official recognition and authority
strength.unfavorable: When excessive, can lead to rigidity and bureaucracy

data.meaning: Represents knowledge, wisdom, and indirect support
data.wealth: Neutral - represents knowledge and wisdom rather than direct wealth
data.relationships: Represents mentors, teachers, and spiritual guides

strength.favorable: When present, brings wisdom and knowledge
strength.unfavorable: When excessive, can lead to over-thinking and detachment

data.relationship: Element that generates this element (opposite polarity)
data.meaning: Represents direct support, protection, and official recognition
data.wealth: Favorable - represents support and protection that can lead to wealth
data.relationships: Represents supportive relationships and protective figures

strength.favorable: When present, brings support and protection
strength.unfavorable: When excessive, can lead to dependency and over-protection

relationships.description: How Ten Gods relate to the Day Master

rules.description: Elements of the same type create 比肩 (same polarity) or 劫财 (opposite polarity)
Elements that this element generates create 食神 (same polarity) or 伤官 (opposite polarity)
Elements that this element controls create 偏财 (same polarity) or 正财 (opposite polarity)
Elements that control this element create 七杀 (same polarity) or 正官 (opposite polarity)
Elements that generate this element create 偏印 (same polarity) or 正印 (opposite polarity)
